Articles.Content:
So, I figure I like to build big sips to haul little stuff out to where ever instead of sending on little thing at a time. With this in mind I started putting together a fleet of ships to serve this purpose. These are the beginnings of the Kerma Fleet.

These are all initial designs and only proven to be able to achieve orbit. All of an unloaded Delta-V of between 8000m/s and 12,000m/s. Only mods in use on these are Fustek's station parts, CBMs and Mech jeb.

Project 1: Fuel Station

Not much to say.

Project 2: Light Science Vessel

Initial design testing.

Project 3: Medium Support Vessel

Initial Design works, make it bigger.

Project 4: Colony Establishment/Colony Supply Vessel

Lets see if we can launch a skyscraper into space. >.>

Project 5: Command&Control / Flagship

The ship. Includes abort sequence life raft for command staff. <.<

I'll put actual specs on these when I get them all together. May post the craft files once optimized if any interest.

A pretty awesome fleet you have there. I like the idea of a permanent orbital flotilla for missions into deep space. The establishment of a massive exploration mission and a force to fend off Deep Space Kraken assaults.

I think I like the Light Science Vessel the most. It looks neat and has the right proportions visually.
